components.name: accordion
components.description: Collapsible content sections with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Supports single or multiple expanded items

components.name: alert
components.description: Alert message display with variants for info, success, warning, and error
components.notes: Use variant prop for different alert types

components.name: avatar
components.description: User avatar with initials generated from name
components.notes: Generates initials from name, supports sm/md/lg sizes

components.name: badge
components.description: Small status indicator labels
components.notes: Multiple color variants available

components.name: breadcrumb
components.description: Navigation breadcrumb trail
components.notes: Customizable separator character

components.name: button
components.description: A focusable button component with keyboard activation
components.notes: Use with FocusGroup for keyboard navigation

components.name: card
components.description: Container card with title, description, content, and footer
components.notes: Supports customizable border styles and optional footer

components.name: checkbox
components.description: A toggleable checkbox component
components.notes: Press Space or Enter to toggle

components.name: confirm-dialog
components.description: A confirmation dialog with Yes/No options
components.notes: Press Y/N for quick selection

components.name: dialog
components.description: Modal dialog overlay with ESC to close
components.notes: Press ESC or Q to close when focused

components.name: kbd
components.description: Keyboard shortcut display component
components.notes: Displays keyboard shortcuts with styled background

components.name: label
components.description: Form label component with required indicator
components.notes: Supports required indicator and description

components.name: list
components.description: A scrollable list with keyboard navigation and selection
components.notes: Supports j/k vim keys, g/G for top/bottom, page up/down

components.name: pagination
components.description: Page navigation with keyboard support
components.notes: Arrow keys or h/l to navigate, g/G for first/last page

components.name: password-input
components.description: A secure password input with masked display and reveal toggle
components.notes: Press Ctrl+R to toggle password visibility

components.name: progress
components.description: Progress bar with percentage display
components.notes: Customizable fill/empty characters and label position

components.name: radio-group
components.description: A radio button group for single selection
components.notes: Supports vertical and horizontal layout

components.name: select
components.description: A dropdown/select component with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Supports both controlled and uncontrolled modes

components.name: separator
components.description: Visual divider line with optional label
components.notes: Supports horizontal and vertical orientation with optional label

components.name: skeleton
components.description: Animated loading placeholder for content
components.notes: Supports text, circular, and rectangular variants with animation

components.name: slider
components.description: Range slider with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Arrow keys or h/l to adjust, 0/$ for min/max

components.name: spinner
components.description: Animated loading spinner with multiple variants
components.notes: Multiple spinner styles: dots, line, arc, circle, bounce

components.name: table
components.description: A data table with row selection and scrolling
components.notes: Supports column definitions with custom widths

components.name: tabs
components.description: Tab navigation with horizontal and vertical layouts
components.notes: Number keys 1-9 for quick access, supports boxed and underline variants

components.name: text-input
components.description: A single-line text input with cursor navigation
components.notes: Use mask prop for password inputs

components.name: textarea
components.description: Multi-line text input with cursor navigation
components.notes: Arrow keys to navigate, Enter for new line

components.name: toast
components.description: Temporary notification messages with auto-dismiss
components.notes: Supports success, error, warning, info variants with auto-dismiss

components.name: toggle
components.description: A switch/toggle component for boolean values
components.notes: Visual switch with ON/OFF labels

components.name: banner
components.description: ASCII art banner with multiple fonts and gradient support
components.notes: Supports fonts: block, slant, small, mini, simple

components.name: collapsible
components.description: Expandable/collapsible content with keyboard toggle
components.notes: Press Space or Enter to toggle

components.name: command
components.description: Command palette with search, grouping, and shortcuts
components.notes: Arrow keys to navigate, Enter to select, Esc to close

components.name: empty
components.description: Empty state placeholder with icon, title, and description
components.notes: Supports sm/md/lg sizes with ASCII art icons

components.name: field
components.description: Form field wrapper with label, error, and description
components.notes: Supports top or left label position

components.name: input-otp
components.description: OTP/PIN code input with configurable length and grouping
components.notes: Supports masking and visual grouping

components.name: scroll-area
components.description: Scrollable container with scrollbar indicator
components.notes: Arrow keys or j/k to scroll, g/G for top/bottom

components.name: toggle-group
components.description: Group of toggle buttons with single or multiple selection
components.notes: Supports horizontal/vertical orientation

components.name: typography
components.description: Text styling with heading, body, code, and quote variants
components.notes: Supports h1-h4, body, small, code, quote, lead variants

components.name: alert-dialog
components.description: Modal alert dialog with confirm/cancel actions
components.notes: Supports destructive variant, Y/N quick keys

components.name: combobox
components.description: Searchable select with autocomplete
components.notes: Type to filter, supports creating new values

components.name: context-menu
components.description: Context menu with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Supports danger items and separators

components.name: drawer
components.description: Slide-out panel from screen edge
components.notes: Supports left/right/top/bottom positions

components.name: dropdown-menu
components.description: Dropdown menu with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Supports separators, shortcuts, and icons

components.name: menubar
components.description: Horizontal menu bar with dropdowns
components.notes: Arrow keys to navigate menus and items

components.name: popover
components.description: Floating popover content
components.notes: Supports top/bottom/left/right positions with title

components.name: sheet
components.description: Modal sheet overlay from screen edge
components.notes: Supports left/right/top/bottom with title and description

components.name: sidebar
components.description: Application sidebar navigation
components.notes: Supports nested items, sections, and collapsed mode

components.name: tooltip
components.description: Informational tooltip on hover/focus
components.notes: Supports top/bottom/left/right positions

components.name: switch
components.description: Toggle switch for boolean values
components.notes: Supports sm/md/lg sizes

components.name: hover-card
components.description: Card that appears on hover/focus
components.notes: Supports top/bottom/left/right positions

components.name: navigation-menu
components.description: Navigation menu with dropdowns
components.notes: Horizontal/vertical orientation with nested items

components.name: resizable
components.description: Resizable panel layout
components.notes: Arrow keys to resize panels

components.name: calendar
components.description: Date calendar with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Arrow keys to navigate, [/] for month, Enter to select

components.name: date-picker
components.description: Date picker input with dropdown calendar
components.notes: Supports short/medium/long date formats

components.name: carousel
components.description: Carousel/slider for cycling through items
components.notes: Supports auto-play and dot indicators

components.name: chart
components.description: ASCII charts for data visualization
components.notes: Supports bar, horizontal-bar, and sparkline types

components.name: data-table
components.description: Advanced data table with sorting and selection
components.notes: Supports sorting, row numbers, striped rows

components.name: form
components.description: Form container with validation support
components.notes: Includes Form, FormField, FormMessage components

components.name: tree-view
components.description: File explorer style tree with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Arrow keys to navigate, Enter to expand/select, g/G for top/bottom

components.name: code-block
components.description: Code display with line numbers and syntax highlighting
components.notes: Supports multiple languages with line highlighting

components.name: terminal
components.description: Terminal output display with command/output/error lines
components.notes: Supports timestamps and multiple line types

components.name: timeline
components.description: Vertical/horizontal timeline with status indicators
components.notes: Supports completed, current, upcoming, and error statuses

components.name: stepper
components.description: Wizard-style step indicator with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Arrow keys to navigate steps, Enter to select

components.name: color-picker
components.description: Color grid selection with keyboard navigation
components.notes: Arrow keys to navigate grid, Enter to select

components.name: tag-input
components.description: Multi-tag entry with add/remove functionality
components.notes: Type to add, Backspace to remove, x to delete focused tag

components.name: avatar-group
components.description: Stacked avatars with overflow indicator
components.notes: Configurable max display with +N overflow

components.name: stat
components.description: Statistics display with delta indicators
components.notes: Includes Stat and StatGroup components

components.name: countdown
components.description: Countdown timer with multiple display formats
components.notes: Supports full, compact, and minimal formats
